title: The Inn of the Abyss / L'Auberge de l'abîme (1943 French film) A Fugitive’s Refuge with No Way Out

sources.title: The Inn of the Abyss / L'Auberge de l'abîme (1943 French film) A Fugitive’s Refuge with No Way Out
sources.description:
At the end of the 19th century, a former Napoleonic officer, Jacques Eymard, is mistaken for a brigand by villagers. Wounded in an ambush and killing in self-defense, he hides in local caves, fearing for his life. Rescued by the dedicated Dr. Thierry, he eventually marries the doctor’s daughter, Martine.

Original title: L'Auberge de l'abîme (The Inn of the Abyss)

Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: André Chamson, Willy Rozier, Raymond Thoumazeau
Stars: Roger Duchesne, Janine Darcey, Aimé Clariond, Daniel Mendaille
Genres:  French cinema, Literary, Drama
Release date: February 24, 1943 (France)
